CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 5, 1958, pg. 6 reads: "12. Lucinda Mallory being congratulated for winning second grand prize of box mattress and springs by Larry Berlin of Ace Furniture Company."
TitMainTitle: Lucinda Mallory being congratulated for winning mattress Larry Berlin of Ace Furniture Company, in Syria Mosque for the 1958 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
